column1: form_zapadoslavia_desc;Like the mighty Yugoslavia to the south
column2: the Western Slav brothers must unite under one banner and do away with the borders that have long divided us.;;;;;;;;;x

column3: §YSlovania§! and §YCroatia§! will become De Jure parts of Austria-Hungary if their De Jure territory is compleatly controled by §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_austria_hungary_desc;It is said that once upon a time the lands of the Austrians and the lands of the Hungarians where united as a single Empire
column2: and its Emperor ruled the world. Whether or not these stories are true
column3: there is no denying how useful such a title will be.;;;;;;;;;x
§YSlovania§! and §YCroatia§! will become De Jure parts of Austria-Romaia if their De Jure territory is compleatly controled by §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_austria_romaia_desc;It is said that once upon a time the lands of the Austrians and the lands of the Hungarians where united as a single Empire
column2: and its Emperor ruled the world. However
column4: we'll have to make do with what we have on our hands now.;;;;;;;;;x

column3: §YSlovania§! and §YCroatia§! will become De Jure parts of Austria-Hungary if their De Jure territory is compleatly controled by §Y[Root.GetBestName]§!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_hungary_austria_desc;It is said that once upon a time the lands of the Hungarians and the lands of the Austrians where united as a single Empire
column2: and its Emperor ruled the world. Whether or not these stories are true
column3: there is no denying how useful such a title will be.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_great_russia_desc;The Legends speak of the times long lost where the all the Slavic people stood united under the mighty Great Russia. Perhaps a great enough ruler can bring these times back.;;;;;;;;;x
form_cccp_desc;The Legends speak of the times long lost where the all the Slavic people stood united under the mighty CCCP and it's great ruler Lord Stalin. Perhaps a great enough ruler
column2: almost rivaling Stalin can bring these times back.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: stalinist_fabricate_evidence_desc;Traitors are everywhere! With enough digging we are sure to find proof of the perfidy of even the most apparently-loyal subject.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the people of India accepted the overlordship of The Queen
column3: and this land was so bountiful that it was graced to be called the Jewel in Her Majesty's Crown. With our conquests of the most crucial cities of India
column4: we can truly claim to be the successors to that great realm.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_european_union_desc;Legends tell of ancient times when all of Europe stood united as one. Perhaps a significantly powerfull ruler may bring those times back?.;;;;;;;;;x
form_european_union_tt;§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! restores §Ythe European Union§! Incorporate held European Kingdoms into the Union.;;;;;;;;;x
form_shiv_sena_desc;The Bharatva faith has never had a proper holy order dedicated solely to fighting the infidel. If I were powerful enough
column2: I might be able to create such an order
column3: bringing all of the faithful's most zealous warriors together under one banner.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: all Indians were united under a single Hindu Rashtra. If I become powerful enough
column3: I could recreate that great Empire

column1: form_macedonia_desc;For centuries Macedonia has been torn between warring states. Now with all core lands of Macedonia under the rule of a true Macedonian
column2: I could be able to reunify those lands into the Macedonia of old.;;;;;;;;;x
so that your riders will respect your might.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_gondor_desc;The Kingdom of Gondor was cruelly destroyed by the British invaders. Now that we have retaken Paris
column2: we can reform this great kingdom and begin the reconquest of our native home!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_arnor_desc;The Kingdom of Arnor was lost by the decadence of the Bonaparte family in centuries past
column2: even before the British invaded. Now that we have retaken Marseille
column3: we can truly call ourselves Kings of Arnor once more.;;;;;;;;;x

column1: form_numenor;Restore the Crown of The White Tree;;;;;;;;;x
form_numenor_desc;Mighty Númenor once stretched from the Pyrenees to the Polders of Holland. That great Empire spread the Novelist faith throughout the land
column2: but the wicked British utterly destroyed it. Now that we have reclaimed much of our ancient glory
column3: we can once again crown ourselves as High King of Numenor!;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_nagaland_desc;Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the bhutanese bureacracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.;;;;;;;;;x
integrate_bengal_desc;Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the bhutanese bureacracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.;;;;;;;;;x
integrate_bihar_desc;Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the bhutanese bureacracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.;;;;;;;;;x
integrate_nepal_desc;Through great talent and expense the emperor of Bhutan can reorganise the bhutanese bureacracy to absorb new regions into its sphere of governance.;;;;;;;;;x

convert_to_oligarchic_republic_indep_desc;Founding a Oligarchic Republic will convert all my Tribal Holdings into Cities. Where this occurs - if the County is big enough - Castle and Temple Holdings will also be created if they do not already exist.;;;;;;;;;x
